Movie.Title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
Movie.Author: Joanne Kathleen Rowling
Movie.Description: Featuring vivid descriptions and an imaginative story line, it followed the adventures of the unlikely hero Harry Potter, a lonely orphan who discovers that he is actually a wizard and enrolls in the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

Movie.Title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Movie.Author: Joanne Kathleen Rowling
Movie.Description:
The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potter's adventures at Hogwarts . A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during
his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school

Movie.Title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Movie.Author: Joanne Kathleen Rowling
Movie.Description: The third installment of the Harry Potter series sees Harry returning to Hogwarts for his third year, where he confronts the escaped prisoner Sirius Black while uncovering the truth about his parents' past.
